channel.title: Docs on Bucket's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Bucket's Notes

item.title: Radical Reduction Guide
item.description: images # These are all the publicly available images of radical reduction to a A/B that I have found so far. The rest are in the non-binary top surgery/top surgery support facebook groups. Carson Wolfe Neutroisthrowaway Neutroisthrowaway glittergirl- glittergirl- mostlypercy mostlypercy negative_delta otsuyu_odashi Dr Mosser Dr Steinwald guidance # UK based # Carson Wolfe’s experience In the UK there doesn’t seem to be a precedence for this, so you might find a doctor who makes you go through a psych eval, or you might find one which doesn’t require that like Elena Prousskaia.

item.title: TNG guide
item.description: Season 1 # Encounter at Farpoint # Not Good, but it introduces everyone and Q Watch until you cant stand it anymore 2/10 The Naked Now # Not Good, but not a nope either. Data gets his funk on 3/10 Code of Honor # NOPE (unless you Really Really like Tasha) 0/10 The Last Outpost # Introduces the ferengi in their TNG conception 4/10 Where No One Has Gone Before # The traveller is cute, wesley is annoying, the concept is alright
